title: 我的服务端突然开不了了
author: 我lovemc321
txt_content:
开服文件格式一直都对
@ECHO OFFcolor 2
title 123
SET BINDIR=%~dp0
CD /D "%BINDIR%"
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar mcpc-plus-1.7.2-R0.4-forge1029-B44.jar

PAUSE

今天一开服就
Error occurred during initialization of UM
Could not reserve enough space for object heap

求大神解决！！！离正式开服只有十天了！！！呜呜呜

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 把内存调小一点试试。或者多尝试几次。

replies.author: 我lovemc321
replies.txt_content:
lichi2050 发表于 2015-8-25 21:32
把内存调小一点试试。或者多尝试几次。
可是服务器一直没有做修改，今天突然就说找不到JAVA，然后我重装了JAVA，就这样了

replies.author: sfter
replies.txt_content: 是不是jdk坏了，我也只是猜测。

replies.author: Yinyu
replies.txt_content:
@echo OFFcolor 2
title 123
SET BINDIR=%~dp0
CD /D "%BINDIR%"
java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar mcpc-plus-1.7.2-R0.4-forge1029-B44.jar

replies.author: aibai
replies.txt_content: 樓主你用java.exe不用javaw.exe真的好←然而對於這方面我不了解_(:зゝ∠)_

replies.author: 我lovemc321
replies.txt_content:
sfter 发表于 2015-8-25 23:27
是不是jdk坏了，我也只是猜测。
我只想问，jdk是啥

replies.author: 寂靜ι
replies.txt_content: 内存有问题，还有我记得不是javaw.exe  你怎么是java.exe???

replies.author: 我lovemc321
replies.txt_content:
lichi2050 发表于 2015-8-25 21:32
把内存调小一点试试。或者多尝试几次。
然而我调了内存就行了
